Stempy – A flexible framework of atomic resolution microscopy data¶

Stempy is a powerful, flexible and intuitive framework for atomic resolution microscopy data analytics.

  • Stempy inclues various packages that are specially elaborated tagerting microscopy community. It only requires a few lines of code to identify atomic defects in microscopy images.

  • Stempy depends only on numpy, scipy, matplotlib, scikit-image, scikit-learn and numba, which are common python packages for scientific computing.

  • Stempy provides flexible interative modes in its plot subpackage to aid active learning, data visualization and publication-quality figure generation.
